summary: This document is an email chain from September 22, 2020, regarding the forwarding of a civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein. The email indicates the submission originates from someone in a foreign country, and the sender notes they do not respond to such submissions but are forwarding it for informational purposes.

events.title: Civilian Crime Report Submission Forwarded
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a civilian crime report submission that purports to relate to Jeffrey Epstein. The sender notes the submission is from someone in a foreign country and that they do not respond to such submissions.

keyFacts: A civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein was forwarded via email on September 22, 2020.
The submission originated from someone in a foreign country.
The email sender states they do not respond to submissions from foreign countries.
The document is labeled as part of the Epstein case files with identifier EFTA00019647.
